dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Does anyone actually care when, like, Kazakhstan's president meets Italy's? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Does anyone actually care when, like, Kazakhstan's president meets Italy's? Seriously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, I think people should, actually. Tokayev himself, he said they have "strong cooperation."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, I think people should, actually. Tokayev himself, he said they have strong cooperation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, Tokayev emphasized the strong cooperation between the two countries in various fields.

dialogue_turns.text: Strong cooperation. Okay, yeah, every leader says that about every meeting. Doesn't mean much, does it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Strong cooperation. Okay, yeah, every leader says that about every meeting. Doesn't mean much, does it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, uh, he specifically mentioned Italian companies operating there. A lot of them, actually, and, like, rapid growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, uh, he specifically mentioned Italian companies operating there. A lot of them, actually, and, like, rapid growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many Italian companies operate in our market, and we are witnessing rapid growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Rapid growth. So what? What's that even mean for us?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rapid growth. So what? What's that even mean for us?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It means Italy is their third largest trading partner. And a top five investor. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It means Italy is their third largest trading partner. And a top five investor. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev also noted that Italy ranks third among Kazakhstanâ„¢s largest trading partners and is among the top five investors in the country's economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Third largest, huh? Okay, uh, what's the damage? Like, how much trade?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Third largest, huh? Okay, uh, what's the damage? Like, how much trade?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty billion dollars last year. Twenty billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty billion dollars last year. Twenty billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year, bilateral trade turnover amounted to approximately $20 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Twenty billion. Sounds, you know, impressive on paper, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Twenty billion. Sounds, you know, impressive on paper, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a huge strategic partnership. Mattarella, he, uh, he praised it. Said they have "excellent relations in all areas."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a huge strategic partnership. Mattarella, he, uh, he praised it. Said they have excellent relations in all areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sergio Mattarella praised the state of bilateral relations and highlighted the significant potential for expanding the strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and Italy. "We indeed have excellent relations in all areas " political, economic, trade, and cultural," added the Italian president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Excellent relations." Are we supposed to be surprised by that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Excellent relations. Are we supposed to be surprised by that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It shows, like, real geopolitical movement. You can't just dismiss $20 billion in trade, can you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It shows, like, real geopolitical movement. You can't just dismiss twenty dollars billion in trade, can you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I dunno. They probably just, like, exchanged gifts and had some boring dinner.

dialogue_turns.text: Tokayev even gave someone a bouquet and invited them to Astana. It's, uh, it's about building ties.

dialogue_turns.text: It is earth-shattering in terms of economic power and, like, global connections. You just, you know, don't want to see it.
